content.p: Assistant Professor, Dr Yazdi's main teaching and research interests are in the fields of environmental impact assessment, water resources management , sustainable drainage systems, flood risk assessment, and porous carbon synthesis. My research career in the Environmental Engineering is characterised by its diversity.
